SKT_FIRST.name: The Wolf King's Fangs
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>recovers</color> <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of damage dealt as Health.
description: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>recovers</color> <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of damage dealt as Health.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、ダメージの<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>のHPを<color=#28d9ed>回復</color>する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Die, Coward!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nIf the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, they take increased damage.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nIf the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, they take increased damage.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 보유하고 있을 때 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\n対象が<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Slay
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>missing Health</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>missing Health</color>.

5: Increases damage to targets with barriers
5_jp: シールドがある対象に与えるダメージUP

SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>현재 체력</color>이 낮을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>残りHP</color>が低いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Heals <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> of the caster's Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of damage dealt.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Heals <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> of the caster's Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of damage dealt.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 자신의 체력 <color=#28d9ed>25%</color>를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 입힌 피해의 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>회복</color>합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:自分のHPを<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>回復する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、与えたダメージの<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>を<color=#28d9ed>回復</color>する。
